ca.team2994.frc.autonomous

Interface DriveManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DriveManagerImpl

    public interface DriveManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void arcadeDrive()
      Drive using arcade drive.
      void driveStraight(double units)
      Uses a PID controller to drive straight units of whatever units we were calibrated to.
      void driveTurn(int degrees)
      Turns degrees degrees to the left when degrees is negative and to the right when degrees is positive.
      void readPIDValues()
      Reads PID values from file and sets them
      void runAutonomous()
      Called at the beginning of autonomous
      void runCalibration()
      Runs a calibration routine to set the encoder distance per pulse.

    • Method Detail

      • driveStraight

        void driveStraight(double units)
        Uses a PID controller to drive straight units of whatever units we were calibrated to.
        Parameters:
        units - Number of units to drive forward. Determined by calibration.

      • driveTurn

        void driveTurn(int degrees)
        Turns degrees degrees to the left when degrees is negative and to the right when degrees is positive. TODO: Check if left and right turns are actually always negative and positive respectively.
        Parameters:
        degrees - The number of degrees to turn

      • arcadeDrive

        void arcadeDrive()
        Drive using arcade drive. This means that the joystick will be used so that the y axis (up and down on the joystick) will move the robot forward and backwards and the x axis (left and right on the joystick) will spin the robot left and right.

      • runCalibration

        void runCalibration()
        Runs a calibration routine to set the encoder distance per pulse.

      • readPIDValues

        void readPIDValues()
        Reads PID values from file and sets them

      • runAutonomous

        void runAutonomous()
        Called at the beginning of autonomous
